parameters.text:
=The page title is: "{{ $('HTML Extract').item.json.title }}" and the target keyword for optimization is: "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.query.keyword }}". Lenght title is: {{ $json.titleLength }}.

Please provide exactly 1 SEO optimization recommendation.  
Return the recommendation only as a JSON object with a single field named "titlerecommendation" containing the advice as plain text

messageValues.message: Return example: {   "titlerecommendation": "Make sure to include the keyword '$keyword' naturally in the page title to improve search ranking." }

parameters.text:
=The keyword to optimize for is: "{{ $json.keyword }}".  
This keyword is use on page: {{ $json.keywordCount }}.
The total number of words on the page is: {{ $json.totalWords }}.  
The keyword density is: {{ $json.keywordDensity }}.

Based on this information, provide exactly 2 SEO optimization recommendations related to keyword usage.  
Return the result strictly as a JSON object with a field named "keywordRecommendations", which contains an array of two tips as strings.

Example return format:

{
  "keywordRecommendations": [
    "Advice 1",
    "Advice 2"
  ]
}
